txt.en: Mailboxes can be used to send letters and items to other players.  The Auction Hall will also send you items that you have purchased or proceeds from your own auctions via the Mail system.

Mailboxes can be used to send letters and items to other players. VIPs can access mail without a mailbox by using the Main Menu. The Auction Hall will also send you items that you have purchased or proceeds from your own auctions via the Mail system.
